thread.title: New Steakhouses Offer a World Beyond Meat and Potatoes

author: Charles Passy
title: New Steakhouses Offer a World Beyond Meat and Potatoes
text:
At Merakia, a restaurant that opened in Manhattanâ€™s Flatiron District last September, diners have their pick of many Greek favorites, from a yogurt dip to a slow-cooked lamb stew.
But they can also choose a dry-aged, bone-in rib-eye or a Porterhouse for two.
In short, Merakia is a Greek steakhouse.
